doc.field: Series I. Chief of Correspondent Files
Series I. Chief of Correspondent Files
Time Inc. Time-Life News Service Records
Time Inc. Time-Life News Service Records

The Bureau Files subseries contains materials from 1935 to 1984 and were collected by a variety of chiefs of correspondents. The materials within the series focus on the operations of various bureaus. While it is clear from the folder contents that chief of correspondents created the materials found in these folders, it is unclear who organized the materials which were separate from the other chief of correspondent files and featured their own style of organization. Contained within this series are clippings, dispatches, resumes, press releases, state department reports, expense reports, lists of bureau employees, floor plans, receipts, budgets, maps, overseas assignment directories, financial reports, stringer payment reports, biographical data sheets, requisition forms, job applications, legal documents, invoices, contracts, leases, and correspondence. The correspondence included in this series discusses staff issues, bureau operations, contacts, stringers, assignments, hiring, raises, salaries, expenses, reactions and criticisms of articles, travel plans, finances, payroll, money advances, leases, reimbursements, housing, and censorship.
Time Inc. Time-Life News Service Records
